snippet: A retiring congressman has lost his bid to give members of Congress $25 a day to help with living expenses in Washington.
abstract: House Appropriations Committee rejects proposal by retiring Rep James P Moran to give members of Congress $25 a day to help with living expenses in Washington.
lead_paragraph: A retiring congressman has lost his bid to give members of Congress $25 a day to help with living expenses in Washington.

headline.main: House Panel Rejects Plan to Aid Lawmakers With Expenses
headline.print_headline: Panel Rejects Plan to Aid Lawmakers With Expenses
